channel.title: Whats ur favorite parts in the whole Half life series?
channel.description:
My personal faves r: Half life original: surface tension the part with the planes and the cliff. Half life 2: Ravenholm and Follow Freeman
whats urs?!?!?!?

item.title: Whats ur favorite parts in the whole Half life series?
item.dc:creator: Berelanai
item.description:
OH EM JEE! sumwun else hoo tinks itz kewl 2 speel lik dat!

Contrary to popular opinion, I really liked the Xen areas in the original and its expansions. Especially in Blue Shift where they had a tangible goal (the teleporter alignment rig). That part where you first make it to the surface in Half Life, but in the middle of a HECU staging ground, so you have to retreat back underground is also fun.

Read full topic
